docTitle.titlePart: Energy Transfer in Dye Solutions of Micellar Structure

byline.docAuthor:
T. Marszalek, A. Baczynski, W. Orzeszko,
and A. Rozploch

titlePage.byline: Institute of Physics N. Copernicus University, Torun

front.div:
A theoretical description of micellar dye solutions containing donors and acceptors is developed.
It is proved experimentally that the luminescent characteristics of Water-Triton X-100 solutions
of Coumarine 1 as a donor and Rhodamine 6G as an acceptor are consistent with the proposed
theory. It is shown that the probability of energy transfer between dye molecules and the number
of detergent molecules in a micelle may be obtained.
